performance_metrics.name: Coverage Percentage
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of the designated service area where the cellular network provides a signal strength above -90 dBm for voice and data services.  Measured periodically (at least monthly) across a 1km x 1km grid.

performance_metrics.name: Throughput (Avg. Download)
performance_metrics.description: Average download speed achieved by users across the network. Measured at multiple points (at least 100) representing diverse user densities and locations. Includes 5G NR Peak Download Speeds.

performance_metrics.name: Latency (Round Trip)
performance_metrics.description: Average delay experienced by data packets traveling between a device and the core network. Critical for real-time applications like VoIP and gaming. Measured across a 1km area.

performance_metrics.name: Signal Strength (Avg. -90 dBm)
performance_metrics.description: Average signal strength received by user devices at -90 dBm. Crucial for maintaining reliable connectivity. Measured continuously via probe nodes distributed across the network.

performance_metrics.name: Handover Success Rate
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of handovers (switching between cell sites) that are completed successfully without interruption. This is essential for seamless mobility.

performance_metrics.name: Resource Utilization (Spectrum)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of available spectrum being utilized effectively. Reflects network efficiency. Calculated across all frequency bands (low, mid, high).

performance_metrics.name: Number of Active Users
performance_metrics.description: Maximum concurrent number of users accessing the network simultaneously. Should be scalable to accommodate peak demand.

implementation_requirements.name: SON Controller Architecture
implementation_requirements.specification: Distributed, modular design with redundancy and failover capabilities. Supports real-time processing with latency < 5ms.
implementation_requirements.description: The SON controller must provide centralized management and optimization functions for the entire network.

implementation_requirements.name: Dynamic Spectrum Allocation (DSA)
implementation_requirements.specification: Automated allocation of spectrum resources based on real-time traffic demands and interference levels.  Supports OAM-13 and OAM-16.
implementation_requirements.description: Dynamic adjustments to resource allocation for maximum efficiency.

implementation_requirements.name: Radio Resource Management (RRM)
implementation_requirements.specification: Includes power control, scheduling, and handover optimization.  Supports 5G NR Beamforming and MIMO.
implementation_requirements.description: Optimized signal propagation and interference mitigation.

implementation_requirements.name: Interference Management
implementation_requirements.specification: Automatic detection and mitigation of interference sources, including neighboring cells and external sources. Supports interference cancellation techniques.
implementation_requirements.description: Minimizes interference to ensure optimal performance.

implementation_requirements.name: Network Slicing Support
implementation_requirements.specification: Capable of creating and managing multiple virtual networks (slices) with customized Quality of Service (QoS) parameters.
implementation_requirements.description: Enables tailored network services for different applications and users.

implementation_requirements.name: Automation Level
implementation_requirements.specification: 95% of network optimization tasks performed automatically.
implementation_requirements.description: Reduces operational overhead and improves response times.

implementation_requirements.name: Security
implementation_requirements.specification: End-to-end encryption, intrusion detection, and access control measures.
implementation_requirements.description: Protect network resources and user data.

operational_considerations: Real-time Monitoring and Analytics: Continuous monitoring of network performance metrics and proactive identification of potential issues.
Remote Management Capabilities: Ability to remotely configure, optimize, and troubleshoot the network.
Scalability: Design for future growth and expansion to accommodate increasing user demand.
Integration with Existing Network Infrastructure: Seamless integration with core network elements and legacy systems.
Maintenance and Support: Comprehensive maintenance and support services to ensure optimal network uptime.
Energy Efficiency: Optimization strategies to minimize energy consumption and operational costs.

input.system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in industrial engineering and specifications. For the given topic, provide a comprehensive overview of industrial/commercial specifications including performance metrics and implementation requirements. Be precise with numerical values and include ranges where appropriate. Focus on practical technical details that would be relevant to professionals in the field.
input.user_message:
Create detailed industrial specifications for: Self-Optimizing Networks (SON)

Format your response as a JSON object with these categories:
1. performance_metrics: An array of metrics with names, values/ranges, and descriptions
2. implementation_requirements: An array of requirements with names, specifications, and descriptions
3. industry_standards: An array of relevant standards and certifications
4. key_suppliers: An array of major equipment/technology suppliers for this industry
5. operational_considerations: An array of important operational factors

Please provide realistic values for industrial/commercial scale implementations.

Return ONLY valid JSON without any additional text, explanation, or code block formatting.
